channel.title: Bypassing blocked websites
channel.description:
IF you are thinking of entering a website that has been blocked by your teacher/parents or anything, YOU should seriously READ THIS TUT... In this tutorial,I will show you an extremely simple way of getting past most public firewall systems and get to any site you wish. This becomes useful in places like the library, school, Starbucks, or places that give you free/pay Wireless access. First, you need to make sure you can access the internet through their connection. Open up your browser and wait for your homepage to load. If it works, then you can continue. If a login screen comes up(Like Starbucks) you may have to pay for the service and this tut will be of no use to you!
First, you need to make sure you can access the internet through their connection. Open up your browser and wait for your homepage to load. If it works, then you can continue. If a login screen comes up(Like Starbucks) you may have to pay for the service and this tut will be of no use to you!
After you have made sure you can access the internet, open up the webpage you would like to view. If the connection is blocked by local firewall hardware, you will see a page by the firewall vendors name saying that site is unavailable.
Now you go to Start>Run then Enter "CMD" (w/o quotes) and hit OK.
Command Propmt should pop up, this is where you will Type: ping http://www.blockedsite.com
Then the I.P. address of the site will appear and the ping statistics will appear. The only thing you are worried about is the IP adress of the website.
Now, go back to your browser and type in the IP as it appeared in Command Prompt. (i.e. ##.##.#.###) The website you are trying to access will now be availible to you!
This may or may not work if the firewall is configured not to allow IP url's, but most places dont worry about this. Now you can access sites with out using proxy's at school! Or rather, you can access proxy sites that your school has blocked! Taken from:http://www.blitzmodz.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=1237 INTRODUCTION BY me~~ ;D

item.title: Bypassing blocked websites
item.dc:creator: @Java_addict Java_addict
item.description:
@Java_addict wrote:

my i.t department are well cruel we cant access anything that hasnt been checked by admins.

this doesnt work in my school.

the i.t guys have about as much power as the headteacher because a few years ago a lad put the whole network down for a few days he put a cd in a drive and this sent a virus all over the network and set a pass for all the pc’s and he got perm excluded coz he forgot pass lol.

i wish my network was like 5 years ago then you could do anything you wanted

Read full topic

item.title: Bypassing blocked websites
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

My school’s IT guy is an idiot, I could run the network better than him… I can use the NET SEND command, I can get into the HD of the computer and edit the TweakXP settings just by typing “explorer C:” in a batch file or the cmd… About this “Bypassing blocked sites”… I don’t know if this works but… If it does, your a legend :). ATM I use my apache server with my DeFilter + Yshout page lol. Plus i got an arcade and music streamer and shit up, I put the title of them all as Google so i can just minimize it lol… Have any of you’s taken a bootable linux CD to your school and got into the hd with full privileges? It works… You need to know the bios password though… my school left it empty so you just press enter lol…

Read full topic

this don’t even work at my school.

It doesn’t work at most schools. The schools disable command prompt.

item.title: Bypassing blocked websites
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

On another topic

Or the really simple way, polysolve.com if that doesn’t work, http://polysolve.com does the same thing.

My school will probably never ban this site since the filter will probably put it in the math category instead of proxy. My firewall caught a spysite on there though…

IF you are thinking of entering a website that has been blocked by your teacher/parents or anything, YOU should seriously READ THIS TUT…
